about_the_game:
The Eternal Lighthouse. At the heart of the sinking city.

Some say it arose as the stars fell from the sky. Others believe it has always been with us.

The pilgrimage to its peak has enticed many to chase the myths of a great power at its apex.

But the horrors lurking in the shadow of the lighthouse are not forgiving.

Forge your own path through the city ruins, overcome the perils that await.

Ascend to the peak of the eternal lighthouse, and uncover what lies beyond...

The Meridian Gate.

Combat


The Meridian Gate offers a diverse set of combat encounters against distinct enemies. Up against foes with beam wielding armaments, it is best to clash swords with them to break their posture and punish them when exposed.



Not all attacks are clashable, some enemies need to be brought down the old fashioned way. Combine your sword combos with heavy weaponry to really lay on the damage.

Almost all projectiles can be deflect or even reversed - always attempt to do so as you will recover stamina and build your health charge.



Some enemies mix up between clashable and non clashable attacks. Blue beams cannot be clashed with. Learn your foe's patterns to expose them and break their posture.
